评论概述: Love it, but a little disappointed
评论详情: The material is great.  It breathes and will keep its color.  The legs are on the shorter side, much to my delight (5’0”).  I have two complaints.  First, the shoulder straps are flimsy, so they fold up on the sides; they could use a layer of sizing to stiffen them up to lay flat.  Second, the sewing of seams is subpar.  After one wear and washing, the leg seam had a hole around 2.5” long.  I had to repair it.  Other than that, I love them!

The initial fit is wonderful.  It's after you wash it that the problem begins.  It shrunkabout 2 inches in length for me.  That makes this a "high water"  outfit.  I got the XXL for'my 5'7" frame.  I've bought 2 others and will consider sending them back because of the shrinking.

These are adorable and comfortable and they fit and I love them but....BUT.... AND THAT'S A REALLY BIG BUT! XD haha... One arrived torn... and The other tore up after pretty much just two maybe 3 wears... Like I didn't even wash them... I didn't even encounter the shrinkage issue... The design is adorable and I got a lot of compliments every time I wore it (the really colorful patchwork one)... And I'm not terribly rough on clothing... This was just normal wear... I wasn't doing any acrobatics... On possibly my third wear the patchwork set tore right across the butt! Like the fabric just shredded... Luckily I was wearing bike shorts underneath too u_u; I attempted to stitch them but I don't have much hope that they'll hold up ...probably what I'll do is just take them apart and use them as a pattern and make my own out of actually good fabric...🤣🤣 Haha... I really wish the fabric was better because I really like them! It's just, they're basically unwearable because the fabric is pitiful! I can't be going out expecting a wardrobe malfunction at any time...😖 So as much as I would like to recommend this I cannot... Steer clear unless you only want them for maybe one event...🥴
Love the bibs! Lots of compliments!! Very comfy and fun.

评论概述: Very cute, heavy linen fabric well made
评论详情: I got the solid blue color and it is very attractive.  Heavy linen fabric, well-stitched.  I am 5'7" and 140 lb, fairly average sized, and bought the large.  It is not too big, but is very roomy and comes down to my ankles.  It can be dressed up with a scarf, and I don't really see this dressed down for around the house wear.  I will get a different pattern or a lighter fabric for that.  This was worth the money.

---  Compré recientemente dos prendas de la marca *Himosyber Women's* y me ha impresionado positivamente. La primera cosa que me llamó la atención fue la **calidad del material**. Es suave al tacto, cómodo de llevar, y tiene una apariencia duradera que resiste bien el uso diario. No se ha desvanecido ni perdido forma después de varios lavados.  El diseño también es un punto a destacar. No solo es moderno y a la moda, sino que se ajusta muy bien al cuerpo, lo cual lo hace perfecto tanto para ocasiones casuales como para eventos más formales. Es una prenda versátil que combina bien con diferentes estilos y complementos.  ---

评论概述: Cute, cool, but not rollercoaster proof
评论详情: I love these overalls! I'm 5'4" and 200 lbs and got an XL and they fit perfectly. I get compliments on them everywhere I go. In fact, I got a compliment on them while in line for the Twisted Colossus ride at Six Flags. Little did I know they were about to contribute to my most embarrassing moment of my life! It was 105 degrees that day and the ride was particularly aggressive  with a lot of sharp drops. At the end of the ride I stood up to get out of the ride and felt a breeze across my backside. I reached back and felt a rip. My friend exclaimed, "your whole butt us out!" Sure enough, there was a rip from pocket to pocket all the way across my bottom! I pinched the top and bottom portions of the fabric together and waddled off the ride and toward the nearest shop where I could buy some shorts, which was all the way across the park! I had to hold my butt to not show my underpants all the way. Lesson learned, stretchy pants only on rollercoasters on hot days. I had to throw away the last pair. There was no saving them with the way they ripped but I will be buying a new pair but won't be wearing them on any rollercoasters in the future.
